item.title: Tom Silvagni, son of AFL great Stephen Silvagni, identified as a rapist as order lifts
item.description: <p>Tom Silvagni&#x27;s identity had been suppressed throughout his rape trial but the order was lifted today by Victorian County Court Judge Andrew Palmer.</p>

item.title: 'Threat to lives and homes': Emergency warnings issued for two Perth bushfires, residents told to leave
item.description: <p>Emergency warnings have been issued for the two blazes, one around Kenwick, in the city&#x27;s east, the other further north in Upper Swan.</p>
